cutlist.description: Generate a list of boards to purchase, and export exact measurements for each cut piece.
cuts.description: Create various configurable cuts, like dovetails, dados, and tenons.
export.description: Export your project to JSON, Excel and various 3D modeling formats.
ruler.description: Make custom measurements for hard to visualize cuts.
transform.description: Rotate, move, and scale your project to fit your needs.
